issue.title: [Julia][Integration] Implement integration testing for Julia
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11584](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11584). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since the Julia implementation claims to support the IPC protocol, it would good to include it in integration testing to ensure cross-implementation compatibility.

You can take a look at <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/format/Integration.html> for basics of integration testing, but feel free to ask any question.
